name: Northern Tale 2
description: After the evil witch Gesta was defeated, the time of peace was restored. The viking king Ragnar decides to restore the kingdom in its former glory â€” repair the ruined villages, heal the cursed trees. However, Gesta is still alive, and the even greater evil is threatening the vikings.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Pentium III 800MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
